description: A 7-segment numeric display, with one or more digits.

contents.name: brightness
contents.description: Controls the brightness of the LEDs. ``0`` means off.

contents.name: double_dots
contents.description:
Turn on or off the column LEDs (separating minutes from hours, etc.) in of the segment.
If the column LEDs is not supported, the value remains false.

contents.name: digit_count
contents.description: The number of digits available on the display.

contents.name: decimal_point
contents.description: True if decimal points are available (on all digits).
